mapper.select: select sc.SCH_NUM, MAX(sc.SCH_CRE) as SCH_CRE, MAX(sc.SCH_TITLE)as SCH_TITLE, MAX(sc.CATE_CODE)as CATE_CODE, MAX(sc.NOTI_LIKES)as NOTI_LIKES, MAX(sc.NOTI_VIEWS)as NOTI_VIEWS, MAX(fi.FILE_NAME)as FILE_NAME, MAX(sc.PET_SPEC) as PET_SPEC from schedule sc left outer join files fi on sc.SCH_NUM = fi.SCH_NUM where CATE_CODE='JARANG' and NOTI_HIDE=1 group by sc.SCH_NUM order by sc.SCH_CRE desc limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
select count(*) as count from schedule where CATE_CODE='JARANG' and NOTI_HIDE=1

select sc.SCH_NUM, MAX(sc.SCH_CRE) as SCH_CRE, MAX(sc.SCH_TITLE) as SCH_TITLE, MAX(sc.CATE_CODE) as CATE_CODE, MAX(sc.NOTI_LIKES) as NOTI_LIKES, MAX(sc.NOTI_VIEWS) as NOTI_VIEWS, MAX(fi.FILE_NAME) as FILE_NAME, (select count(*) + 1 from schedule where NOTI_LIKES > sc.NOTI_LIKES) AS rank from schedule as sc left outer join files fi on sc.SCH_NUM = fi.SCH_NUM where CATE_CODE='JARANG' and NOTI_HIDE=1 group by sc.SCH_NUM order by rank asc

select sc.SCH_NUM, MAX(sc.SCH_CRE) as SCH_CRE, MAX(sc.SCH_TITLE)as SCH_TITLE, MAX(sc.CATE_CODE)as CATE_CODE, MAX(sc.NOTI_LIKES)as NOTI_LIKES, MAX(sc.NOTI_VIEWS)as NOTI_VIEWS, MAX(fi.FILE_NAME)as FILE_NAME, MAX(sc.PET_SPEC) as PET_SPEC from schedule sc left outer join files fi on sc.SCH_NUM = fi.SCH_NUM left outer join Member me on sc.MEM_NUM = me.MEM_NUM where CATE_CODE='JARANG' and NOTI_HIDE=1 and if(#{diary.title} is not null, sc.SCH_TITLE like CONCAT('%', #{diary.title}, '%'), sc.SCH_TITLE like '%%') and if(#{diary.member} is not NULL, me.MEM_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{diary.member}, '%'), me.MEM_NAME like '%%') group by sc.SCH_NUM order by sc.SCH_CRE desc limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
select count(*) as count from schedule where SCH_TITLE like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
select count(*) as count from schedule sc left outer join Member me on sc.MEM_NUM = me.MEM_NUM where me.MEM_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{member}, '%')
mapper.update: update schedule set NOTI_VIEWS = NOTI_VIEWS + 1 where SCH_NUM=#{dno}
mapper.select: select fi.FILE_NAME from schedule sc left outer join files fi on sc.SCH_NUM = fi.SCH_NUM where CATE_CODE='JARANG' and NOTI_HIDE=1 and sc.SCH_NUM = #{dno}

select sc.SCH_NUM, sc.SCH_CRE, sc.SCH_TITLE, sc.SCH_CONTENT, sc.CATE_CODE, sc.NOTI_LIKES, sc.NOTI_VIEWS, fi.FILE_NAME, me.MEM_name from schedule sc left outer join files fi on sc.SCH_NUM = fi.SCH_NUM left outer join pet pe on sc.PET_NUM = pe.PET_NUM left outer join member me on sc.PET_NUM = me.MEM_NUM where sc.CATE_CODE='JARANG' and sc.NOTI_HIDE=1 and sc.SCH_NUM = #{dno}
mapper.delete: delete from LIKES where SCH_NUM = #{SCH_NUM} and MEM_NUM = #{mno}
mapper.update: update schedule set NOTI_LIKES = NOTI_LIKES + 1 where SCH_NUM = #{like_SCH_NUM}
update schedule set NOTI_LIKES = NOTI_LIKES - 1 where SCH_NUM = #{like_SCH_NUM}
mapper.select: select NOTI_LIKES from schedule where SCH_NUM = #{like_SCH_NUM}
select LIKE_NUM from Likes where SCH_NUM = #{SCH_NUM} and MEM_NUM = #{mno}
